file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-71-02-04 - CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Underwater Locator Beacon (ULB) attached to the Solid State Cockpit Voice Recorder (SSCVR). B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON ALL 23-71-02-000-801-A - REMOVAL CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON ALL 23-71-02-400-801-A - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-71-02 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-71-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the ULB attached to the SSCVR. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR - Rear electronic compartment door Fuselage rear section Ι - right side D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY To get access to the Rear Electronic Com- GSE 036 Platform, hydraulic partment Commercially To loosen the screws that attach the ULB to Allen wrench, 9/64 in available the SSCVR E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put up the hydraulic platform at the necessary height. (2) Open access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-71-02 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) On the SSCVR (1), loosen the screws (3) sufficiently to permit the removal of the ULB (4) from the supports (2). (2) Remove the ULB (4) from the supports (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-71-02 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

ULB 3. SCREWS 2. SUPPORTS DET. B EM145AMM230078B.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-71-02 Page 4 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH L3 CVR INSTALLED Underwater Locator Beacon - Removal/Installation Figure 402 B A ZONE 272 REAR ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT DET. A 1. SSCVR 2. SUPPORT (2) 1 3. SCREW (3) 4. UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON 5. WATER SWITCH DET. B 1 ADHESIVE SEALANT LOCTITE 221. EM145AMM231030A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-71-02 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-71-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the ULB on the SSCVR. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR - Rear electronic compartment Fuselage rear section Ι - right side D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY To get access to the Rear Electronic Com- GSE 036 Platform, hydraulic partment Commercially Allen Wrench, 9/64 in To remove the ULB available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear electronic compartment I. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the new ULB (4) into the two supports (2). (2) Turn the ULB (4) until you can read the battery replacement label easily. (3) Tighten the screws (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-71-02 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) Remove the access platform. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-71-02 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
